channel.title: Global Economy on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Global Economy on FinanClub

item.title: NEM
item.description: score:38 Chances: The recent surge in gold prices to an all-time high of $2,135 per ounce is a positive indicator for Newmont Corp. Expectations of interest rate cuts next year and weakening dollar can further boost the gold market, benefiting Newmont Corp. Value stocks, including gold stocks, are in a good place as global yield curves suggest interest rates will start tapering next year.

item.title: INFY
item.description: score:43 Chances: India’s information technology firms are accepting tougher contract terms to win large deals from clients as they compete for fewer orders in an uncertain global economy. Generative AI technology can create more jobs than it is expected to eliminate, according to Tech Mahindra’s outgoing CEO.
